echo rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location" && rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location"
#end if
## Create target directory structure based on <ROOT>, <TEST>, <RUNID>, <SAMPLEID> ## File extension is whatever Galaxy says it is, unless modified above. #if str($move_type.move_type_sel) == "test_run_sample": #if $move_type.add_date #import datetime #set $date = datetime.date.today().year #set $move_dir = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($date), str($move_type.runid)]) #set $move_location = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($date), str($move_type.runid), str($move_type.sampleid)]) #else #set $move_dir = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($move_type.runid)]) #set $move_location = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($move_type.runid), str($move_ty pe.sampleid)]) #end if
mkdir -p $move_dir &&
#if $move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext_sel == "yes_set_ext" #if $move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext #set $file_ext = str($move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext) #set $move_location += $file_ext #end if #else #set $move_location += $file_ext #end if
echo rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location" && rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location"
#end if
## Create target directory structure based on <ROOT>, <TEST>, <GENDER>, <SAMPLEID> ## File extension is whatever Galaxy says it is, unless modified above. #if str($move_type.move_type_sel) == "test_gender_sample": #set $move_dir = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($move_type.gender)]) #set $move_location = '/'.join([str($move_type.base_dir), str($move_type.test_name), str($move_type.gender), str($move_typ e.sampleid)])
mkdir -p $move_dir &&
#if $move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext_sel == "yes_set_ext" #if $move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext #set $file_ext = str($move_type.do_set_ext.set_ext) #set $move_location += $file_ext #end if #else #set $move_location += $file_ext #end if
echo rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location" && rsync --chmod=ug-wx,o-rwx -iptv "${input_file}" "$move_location"
#end if
#if $file_ext.endswith('.bam') && samtools index "$move_location" #end if
> ${output_log}

tool.help:
Move a file (Galaxy dataset) to some location on the file system.
File move options:
Test and Run - Send a file to a directory composed of BASE_DIR, TEST, RUN_ID. BASE_DIR is set in the workflow, while TEST and RUN_ID are usually pulled in automatically during workflow generation.
Test, Run, and Sample - Send a file to a directory composed of BASE_DIR, TEST, RUN_ID, and SAMPLE_ID. BASE_DIR and TEST are set in the workflow, while RUN_ID and SAMPLE_ID are usually pulled in automatically during workflow generation. You can set file extension manually, or just utilize whatever Galaxy gives you.
